translation.en: [TV host] She's stacking three layers of chocolate sponge
translation.zh: 她正在三层柠檬上堆叠

translation.en: on top of three layers of lemon, sandwiched with fresh raspberries…
[Rahul] I'm making buttercream roses.
[Jon] My artistic skills coming out now.
translation.zh: 现在我的艺术能力展现出来了

translation.en: I'd love to get the presentation right. Probably the opposite of Kim-Joy.
translation.zh: 我想让蛋糕看起来有模有样我可能跟金·乔伊完全相反

translation.en: [Kim-Joy] Yeah, I think I like the decorating. It's probably my favorite part…
translation.zh: 对 我觉得我喜欢这个装饰这可能是我最喜欢的部分

translation.en: -[Noel] Come on, kids. -[Sandi] You can do this, Rahul.
[Ruby] I don't think that's gonna stay. It's literally caved in at the back.
translation.zh: 我觉得立不住 后面真的塌陷了

translation.en: [Noel] Bakers, you--
[Ruby] …stay. It's literally caved in at the back.
[Noel Fielding] Bakers, you only have one minute left.
translation.zh: 烘焙师们 你们还剩一分钟

translation.en: -[Manon] Okay, do you need help? -[man screaming] [Briony] It's okay. You've got this.
[Jon] I think I've done Del Boy proud. He'd try and sell it for a couple quid.
translation.zh: 我觉得我让德尔·博伊很骄傲他想把这东西几英镑卖出去

translation.en: [Ruby] Look at the state of it. What an absolute state.
translation.zh: 看看这个状态 这个状态太绝了

translation.en: [Rahul] It looks terrible. Melting and breaking from everywhere.
translation.zh: 看起来很糟糕 融化着 到处都坏了

translation.en: [Jon] There it is. It's done.
[Ruby] That's it, guys. I'm so wounded.
translation.zh: 可以了 各位 我好受伤

translation.en: [Sandi] I'm sorry, bakers, but your time is up.
translation.zh: 很遗憾 烘焙师们 但你们的时间到了

translation.en: That is the end of all of your vegan challenges. Well done.
translation.zh: 你们的素食挑战结束了 辛苦了

translation.en: -Oh God. No. -I think your cake's just fallen.
translation.zh: 天啊 不是吧 你的蛋糕好像塌方了

translation.en: [in Mandarin] No, no, no, no!
[in Mandarin] When was the last time you killed someone?
translation.zh: 你上次杀人是什么时候？

translation.en: Couple weeks ago.
[man] Are you serious? Who did you kill?
translation.zh: 妈的 真的假的？杀了谁啊？

translation.en: Some guy who was causing trouble at the docks.
translation.zh: 在码头捣乱的一个咖 我杀人

translation.en: I usually don't take the time to ask their names. Why?
translation.zh: 没在问名字的 干嘛？

translation.en: I've been in this game almost 30 years. Fuck.
translation.zh: 干了这个行业快30年了 妈的

translation.en: I used to be the guy they called when things got real.
translation.zh: 以前呐 有什么大事都来找我

translation.en: Now I'm only brought in to clean up someone else's mess. [scoffs]
translation.zh: 现在呢 在帮别人擦屁股啊

translation.en: We do what we're told.
Maybe they're trying to keep you out of trouble.
translation.zh: 可能他们是不想给你惹麻烦吧

translation.en: Like a sign of respect.
My nickname is Blood Boots.
Shouldn't I get them bloody every once in a while?
translation.zh: 不就是要偶尔搞点血腥吗？

translation.en: Hey, bro, this is what happens when you give yourself a nickname.
translation.zh: 哎 兄弟 有绰号就是这样

translation.en: It creates too many expectations.
There's blood on your boots now.
[man, in English] Shut up.
[in Mandarin] Hurry up. Less talking, more disposing of bodies.
translation.zh: 快点啦 啰嗦 赶快给我搬走 楼下还有邻居呢

translation.en: I have neighbors.
translation.zh: 赶快给我搬走 楼下还有邻居呢

translation.en: Damn, did you burn something?
translation.zh: 妈的 什么东西烧焦了

translation.en: Dad.
Isn't he supposed to be in hiding?
He was worried about you.
Did you burn something?
Why only three?
They know you,
know what you can do.
Why only send three?
And why here?
Better to attack when you get out of your car,
translation.zh: 他们应该在你下车的地方下手

translation.en: where there's room for them to escape if it goes wrong.
translation.zh: 那样万一有状况 他们好撤

translation.en: Or…
when you get out of the elevator.
translation.zh: 在你出电梯的时候动手

translation.en: Tight quarters in the hallway removes your advantage.
translation.zh: 那里空间狭窄 你没有优势

translation.en: Maybe they're bad at their jobs.
You should have kept one alive to question.
translation.zh: 怎么不留一个活口来问话呢？

translation.en: You enjoy killing too much.
translation.zh: 你呀 就是太喜欢杀、杀、杀

translation.en: I'm sure Sleepy Chan sent them.
Probably payback for the dumbass Xing killed on the docks.
translation.zh: 说不定那个被星在码头干掉的二百五在报仇

translation.en: Always consider the most complicated possibility,
translation.zh: 永远要假设各种复杂的可能性

translation.en: then work your way back to the most obvious answer.
translation.zh: 然后往回推 找出最明显的答案

translation.en: Then you will never be surprised.
translation.zh: 这样你就永远不会措手不及

translation.en: Yes.
What's wrong?
-Move! -Cover us!
-Cover us! -Go get the car!
Hsiao…
Han.
[man, in Mandarin] Make the windows bulletproof
and put a steel bomb-shield under the chassis.
Hurry!
Any word from the hospital?
[in English] We should switch to English.
We don't know who we can trust.
He's out of surgery.
In a coma.
There was a lack of blood flow to the brain,
so we don't know if he will wake up.
translation.zh: 所以不知道他能否醒来

translation.en: I want Sleepy Chan, and his vain prick son Drowsy, alive.
translation.zh: 我想活捉睡眼詹和他那个废物儿子乔西

translation.en: No one gets to kill them but me.
translation.zh: 除了我 别人都不许杀他们

translation.en: Okay, but--
They used me as bait to draw my father out of hiding.
translation.zh: 他们把我当成诱饵把躲起来的我爸引了出来

translation.en: Sleepy Chan is tired of being head of the second most powerful Triad family.
translation.zh: 睡眼詹受够了做第二强大三曾会家族的老大

translation.en: He wants to take our place, maybe even declare himself Dragon Head.
translation.zh: 他想取代我们的位置甚至要自封为龙首

translation.en: But we don't know if Sleepy Chan is behind this.
translation.zh: 但我们不知道这件事是不是睡眼詹指使的

translation.en: No one could ID the attackers. These are fresh faces.
translation.zh: 没人认得出凶手 这些都是新面孔

translation.en: Some new gang with the balls and brains to find me
translation.zh: 一个新的帮派有这样的胆子和脑子来找我

translation.en: and organize a sophisticated attack like that?
No way.
[man, in Mandarin] Charles.
[in English] Your father would tell you to be cautious.
translation.zh: 你父亲会告诉你要小心

translation.en: Not to jump to conclusions.
If this wasn't Sleepy Chan,
translation.zh: 如果这件事不是睡眼詹干的

translation.en: you could start a full-out war for no reason.
translation.zh: 你可能会无端挑起全面战争

translation.en: Don't be headstrong, huh?
translation.zh: 不要刚愎自用 好吧？

translation.en: My father noticed something about the body before he was shot. Any idea what it was?
translation.zh: 我爸注意到了尸体的问题知道那是什么吗？

translation.en: No, but I did hear what he said to you after he was shot.
translation.zh: 不知道 但我听到了他中枪之后对你说的话

translation.en: Your mother's name.
[in Mandarin] Charles.
[in English] What has your father always taught you? Huh?
translation.zh: 你爸一直是怎样教你的？嗯？

translation.en: Protect the family.
If anything ever happened to him, to go look after my mother. No hesitation.
translation.zh: 如果他发生了什么事情就去找你妈妈 不要犹豫

translation.en: Your mother must be protected at all costs.
translation.zh: 必须不惜一切保护你妈妈

translation.en: She is the key to our power.
Look, she left because it was her duty to go.
translation.zh: 听着 她离开是因为那是她的责任

translation.en: -To-- -Protect the family.
I know.
Your mother and Bruce are alone out there.
translation.zh: 你妈妈和布鲁斯两个人单独在外面

translation.en: -Do you want me to send someone with you? -No.
I don't wanna draw any attention.
-And I'll have my brother. -I don't think he's gonna be much help.
translation.zh: -我还有我弟-我觉得他帮不上什么忙

translation.en: He wasn't raised in this life.
translation.zh: 他不是在这样的环境下成长的

translation.en: He'll have to learn quickly, then.
translation.zh: 那他就需要快点学习了

translation.en: He's a Sun.
♪ You know I'm comin' back If you move it like that ♪
-Two, I can make it all about you… ♪ -Damn.
♪ Four, yeah, I think I like that more ♪ ♪ Sheesh dressed real clean Like James Dean… ♪
-There. That's our Lyft. -♪ I can make you go mainstream ♪
translation.zh: 喂 在那里 那是我们的来福车

translation.en: -♪ Never come down… ♪ -Hello, ladies.
-Aah! How's it goin'? You guys have-- -[retching]
No, no, no! No! No, no, no!
-When did you have pizza? -♪ Gimme some, some of that ♪
♪ Somethin' I cannot buy ♪
♪ Phone's been on blast like all day… ♪
[woman] Bruce! Wake up!
You're going to be late!
I'm coming.
-Were you out working late last night? -Yep.
translation.zh: -你昨晚出去工作到很晚吗？-对

translation.en: Just working?
Yes, Mom. I stopped doing the other thing.
translation.zh: 是的 妈妈 另一件事我已经停了

translation.en: I swear.
Oh, chubby cheeks. I'm so proud of you.
translation.zh: 嘟嘟脸 我太为你骄傲了

translation.en: -Text me when you get to school. -Why?
Because I just told you to.
Go get smart.
Okay.
-♪ Here I am dreaming again ♪ -♪ Dreaming ♪ -♪ Dreaming ♪ -♪ Dreaming ♪
-♪ It always makes me cry… ♪ -There's still 20 minutes left.
Oh, but I'm-- I'm finished.
You turned the last one in early, too, and it cost you points.
translation.zh: 上次你也先交卷了 你都因此丢分了

translation.en: Bs still get degrees.
No.
I-- I just need a tiny extension to get the money together.
translation.zh: 我只需要延期一点点去凑钱

translation.en: Bruce, the only extension I want from you
translation.zh: 布鲁斯 我唯一想要的延期

translation.en: is you extending your hand to grab a pen and write me a tuition check.
translation.zh: 是你抓起笔给我写支票这个时间

translation.en: You have until tomorrow or we'll have no choice
translation.zh: 给你到明天 不然我们就没办法了

translation.en: but to invalidate the semester.
translation.zh: 只能让这学期的课程无效了

translation.en: Okay.
Just…
How much education would this buy me?
translation.zh: 这些能让我买到多少教育？

translation.en: There's $7 here.
And this bill smells like puke.
translation.zh: 这钞票闻起来像呕吐物

translation.en: It's a down payment.
You can't even buy a club sandwich in the cafeteria for $7.
translation.zh: 咖啡厅里七美元都买不到三层三明治

translation.en: Maybe that's the problem.
Maybe we-- we should all refuse to pay our tuition
translation.zh: 也许我们都应该拒绝支付学费

translation.en: until the school addresses
the economic injustice of this institution!
translation.zh: 这个大学经济上的不公平问题

translation.en: Who's with me?
Get out of the way!
-You suck, dude. Move! -Next.
translation.zh: 你太衰了 兄弟 走开！ 下一个

translation.en: Yo!
-Hands up, bitch! -Fucking bitch!
translation.zh: -举起手来 贱人！-废物贱人！

translation.en: Dude, I could have shot you.
translation.zh: 兄弟 我刚刚本可能开枪杀你的

translation.en: You have a gun?
No, but if I did, I could have shot you.
translation.zh: 没有 但如果我有刚才就开枪杀掉你了

translation.en: -What's up, baby? -What's up?
Yo, you're just in time. I'm about to smoke me a little kush
translation.zh: 哟 你来得正好 我刚要吸点大麻

translation.en: and hang out with my boy Keanu on Cyberpunk.
translation.zh: 然后跟我《赛博朋克》上的朋友基努一起玩

translation.en: You, uh, gettin' high on your own supply?
translation.zh: 你把卖给别人的货 自己吸了？

translation.en: I sell molly and cocaine.
translation.zh: 我卖的是摇头丸和可卡因

translation.en: Weed's legal.
Dude, I'm starting to think my thumbs are, like, freakishly fast.
translation.zh: 兄弟 我开始觉得我的大拇指异常地快

translation.en: Like Julio Jones fast, but just my thumbs.
translation.zh: 像胡里奥·琼斯那样快但是我的大拇指

translation.en: Alexa, play my jams.
translation.zh: 亚历克莎语音助手 播放我的歌

translation.en: [Alexa] You got it.
Can I, um…
I need a favor.
Anything, bro.
I need to borrow some money.
Bruce.
How long have I known you? Since the fifth grade?
translation.zh: 我认识你多久了？从五年级开始就认识了吧？

translation.en: Hell, I practically taught your ass English.
translation.zh: 天啊 你的英语基本都是我教的

translation.en: Bro, friends like us? They don't borrow, man.
translation.zh: 兄弟 像我们这样的朋友？不用借 兄弟

translation.en: They give.
So, how much we talkin'?
-Dollars? -It's for school.
-I will pay you back. -Doesn't your mom pay for school?
translation.zh: -我会还你的-你妈不给你付学费吗？

translation.en: Yes, but I kind of spent this semester's tuition money on something else.
translation.zh: 付 但我把这学期的学费花在别地方了

translation.en: I thought you stopped with that stuff. You promised your mom.
translation.zh: 我以为你不再弄那东西了呢你答应你妈的

translation.en: It's the best improv class in LA.
translation.zh: 那是洛杉矶最好的即兴表演课

translation.en: Will Ferrell and Rachel Dratch are alums!
translation.zh: 威尔·费雷尔和瑞秋·德拉彻都是校友！

translation.en: You spent five grand learning how to play pretend.
translation.zh: 你花了五千美元去学怎么假装表演

translation.en: -[laughing] -It's improv, okay?
It-- it's an art form.
[scoffs] Okay! If you're so proud of it, why not tell your mom you're doing it?
translation.zh: 好 既然你对此这么骄傲为什么不告诉你妈 你在学习呢？

translation.en: 'Cause she thinks it's a waste of time,
translation.zh: 因为她觉得是浪费时间布鲁斯·孙没有那个勇气

translation.en: and Bruce Sun doesn't have the nuts to be his own man.
translation.zh: 因为她觉得是浪费时间布鲁斯·孙没有那个勇气 挺起胸膛做自己

translation.en: Yo, you think John Cho hides what he does from his mom?
translation.zh: 哟 你觉得约翰·赵做什么事情瞒着他妈吗？

translation.en: Plus, my cash is more powder than liquid right now, so, uh…
translation.zh: 而且我现在没多少现金全换成粉了 所以…

translation.en: [whispers] Shit.
Listen, I do have a way you can earn that money.
translation.zh: 听着 我有办法能让你挣到那笔钱

translation.en: -I'm not selling drugs, TK. -[gasps] That's not my plan.
translation.zh: 我不卖毒品 TK 那不是我的计划

translation.en: It's always your plan.
Okay, that's my plan.
translation.zh: 好吧 那是我的计划

translation.en: It's my night to do handouts at the club, and I could use your help.
translation.zh: 我今晚要在俱乐部往出发你可以来帮我

translation.en: With the two of us, we would clear five G so easy.
translation.zh: 我们两个人一起很快就能赚出五千块了

translation.en: Dude, I am not a criminal!
Yeah, and neither am I.
I'm an employee at a company that sells a product.
translation.zh: 我是一家销售产品的公司的雇员

translation.en: We have a hierarchy.
We have quotas just like every pharmaceutical company out there!
translation.zh: 我们和其他制药公司一样都有销售指标！

translation.en: Well, except if I fuck up, they slit my throat, toss me in a sack in the Rio Hondo.
translation.zh: 只不过 如果我搞砸了 他们会弄死我把我丢进麻袋 扔到深河

translation.en: Yeah, you're not doing a good job selling this.
How's this for a sell?
translation.zh: 这样说 你觉得怎么样？

translation.en: There's no way you're gonna earn five grand in a year, let alone one night.
translation.zh: 你一年都赚不到五千块别说一晚上了

translation.en: Aren't you studying to be a doctor?
Dude, all you're gonna do your whole life is sell drugs anyway.
translation.zh: 你一辈子要做的就是卖药

translation.en: I bet you can earn college credit if you work with me tonight.
translation.zh: 你今晚跟我一起工作说不定还能获得绩点呢

translation.en: -[chuckles] -If I'm just doing handoffs
and collecting money,
it's not technically selling drugs.
I mean, it totally is. It's, like, exactly selling them.
translation.zh: 绝对是 那就是贩毒啊

translation.en: But who cares?
How about this? Don't even sell the drugs.
Just act like a dude who's selling the drugs.
translation.zh: 只需要演一个贩毒的人

translation.en: I mean, ah, it-- it would be a good acting exercise.
translation.zh: 我是说 这会是一个不错的演艺练习

translation.en: Uh-huh.
-Yeah. -Now we're talkin'.
[whispers] Okay. Okay.
-Yeah. -Mm-hmm?
-Let's do it. -That's my boy right there.
translation.zh: -我们来吧-这才是我的好兄弟嘛

translation.en: Choosin' life just like Wham!
[woman] Hello and welcome to Los Angeles.
translation.zh: 您好 欢迎来到洛杉矶

translation.en: The current temperature is 72 degrees Fahrenheit.
Please do not forget to check the seat-back pocket for smaller items.
translation.zh: 请记得检查座椅后方的口袋不要忘掉小物品

translation.en: Checked luggage can be found at carousel seven.
translation.zh: 托运行李可以在七号转盘提取

translation.en: Thank you for flying with us, and please enjoy your stay in sunny Los Angeles.
translation.zh: 感谢您乘坐本次航班祝您在阳光明媚的洛杉矶旅途愉快

translation.en: Who sent you?
[in Mandarin] Sleepy Chan?
[in Mandarin] Riddance of evil… must be thorough.
-[dog barking] -Bruce.
Bruce.
Ma.
[in Mandarin] Charles?
Who's this?
I don't know.
I brought pastries.
Your beard looks terrible.
Look what you did to the house!
translation.zh: 你看你把家里搞成什么样子

translation.en: He did most of this.
Did you even try to clean up?
translation.zh: 你有打算要收拾一下的吗？

translation.en: Do you not clean up after yourself at home?
translation.zh: 你在家里闹事 也都不收拾的吗？

translation.en: I usually smoke and wait for people to come clean up.
translation.zh: 我平常抽根烟 都别人来处理

translation.en: There are no people here.
Just us.
Little Fatty.
My handsome little boy.
Have you eaten? Come on, I'll make you beef noodles.
translation.zh: 吃了没？我煮个牛肉面给你

translation.en: Fetch the good knife.
Have you gotten married yet?
They shot Dad.
He's in a coma.
Will he live?
They don't know.
He's strong.
A boy from the country doesn't get to where he got if he's not strong.
translation.zh: 如果不强 他一个乡下的小子也不会混到这个地位

translation.en: I saw that in him before anyone else did.
translation.zh: 别人没看出来 我早就看出来了

translation.en: It was Sleepy Chan.
Those two have been fighting to be the big fish for 20 years.
translation.zh: 二十年来 这两个人一直在争老大的地位

translation.en: But we can't jump to conclusions.
There is always more than what first appears.
Maybe it's time we cash in the insurance policy.
translation.zh: 是时候把筹码拿出来了

translation.en: I decide when and if we do that.
translation.zh: 要不要用 什么时候用 我说了算

translation.en: With all due respect,
you washed your hands in the golden bowl a long time ago.
With Big Sun the way he is, anyway, I'm in charge.
translation.zh: 爸现在住院 基本我是老大了

translation.en: Who taught you to chop?
TV?
-[sighs] -[in English] Go start cleaning up.
Is this him?
He looks soft.
[chuckles] Not soft.
Sensitive.
Same thing.
He wanted to be an actor.
One of those who makes stuff up as he goes?
-Improv? -Yeah, I put a stop to that.
Does he know about me and Dad? About where he comes from?
translation.zh: 他知道我和我爸吗？知道他的出身吗？

translation.en: He thinks his father is a gambler
and, uh, you are in Antarctica working with penguins.
translation.zh: 你在南极洲和企鹅共事

translation.en: [in Mandarin] Fuck.
[in English] Is he stupid?
Bruce and I kept hidden from the world by being boring.
translation.zh: 布鲁斯和我一直过着无聊的生活避开这个世界

translation.en: I kept you hidden from him by being exciting.
translation.zh: 我让你很刺激 让你避开他

translation.en: Both work.
I need to find local muscle to help me look after you.
translation.zh: 我必须找到当地的打手来帮我照顾你

translation.en: Yuan told me about a club where I can find some guys.
translation.zh: 元告诉了我一个俱乐部可以找到一些人手

translation.en: I thought my brother would be able to have my back, but…
translation.zh: 我还以为我弟能帮我 但是现在看来他没什么用除非睡眼想玩猜谜游戏

translation.en: appears he's useless unless Sleepy wants to play charades.
translation.zh: 但是现在看来他没什么用除非睡眼想玩猜谜游戏

translation.en: We have to stay hidden for as long as possible.
Whoever's behind this followed you here from Taipei,
translation.zh: 这件事的幕后黑手从台北一路跟你到了这里

translation.en: but you were too arrogant to notice.
translation.zh: 但你太傲慢了 都没注意到

translation.en: Your only responsibility right now is to protect me and Bruce.
translation.zh: 你现在唯一的责任 是保护我和布鲁斯

translation.en: Bruce is a grown man. He should be able to look after himself.
translation.zh: 布鲁斯已经长大了现在应该能照顾好自己了

translation.en: In a few hours, they're gonna realize this one hadn't succeeded.
translation.zh: 几个小时后 他们就会知道这个人没有成功

translation.en: I'll be back before then.
I am not a kid anymore.
translation.zh: 我已经不再是小孩子了

translation.en: I know what I'm doing.
-[in Mandarin] You're not going to eat? -I'm not hungry.
Come on, the boss needs to make sure you're cool.
translation.zh: 来吧 老板需要知道你可以

translation.en: But, uh, I'm not cool.
Not that kind of cool.
Cool as in not a cop and won't totally fuck this up.
translation.zh: 他要确保你不是警察不会把这件事搞砸

translation.en: Wait, wait. I-- I don't think I can go through with this.
translation.zh: 等一下 我不觉得应该进行这一步

translation.en: It's not a big deal. Come on.
translation.zh: 不是什么大事 来吧

translation.en: Yes, it is.
My mom is, like, super cheap,
so the Wi-Fi in our house is terrible,
but the guy next door has, like, mega 5G with boosters and everything.
translation.zh: 但是隔壁的人有超快速的5G网还有信号增强装置什么的

translation.en: Okay, so?
Two years ago, I figured out his password.
translation.zh: 两年前 我破解了他的密码

translation.en: It was his home address.
But I never logged onto his network.
translation.zh: 但我从来没有登陆他的网络

translation.en: Do you understand?
Yeah. You're an idiot.
No!
I-- I'm an honest person.
Okay? I don't steal or hurt people.
translation.zh: 我不会偷窃别人 不会伤害别人

translation.en: Selling drugs isn't technically either.
translation.zh: 贩毒理论上也不是偷窃 不是伤害但是感觉跟这两个性质差不多

translation.en: -But it feels like it's the same family. -Look, Bruce, I know you.
translation.zh: 贩毒理论上也不是偷窃 不是伤害但是感觉跟这两个性质差不多 布鲁斯 我懂你我知道你想要的人生是怎样

translation.en: I know what you want out of life.
translation.zh: 布鲁斯 我懂你我知道你想要的人生是怎样

translation.en: You want that million-dollar car,
translation.zh: 你想要那百万美元的车

translation.en: hot girls goin' wild,
translation.zh: 性感的女孩疯狂追着你

translation.en: and the envy and adoration of every guy from here to Hong Kong.
translation.zh: 从这里一路到香港每一个男人都嫉妒你、崇拜你

translation.en: I guess. I mostly just don't wanna be the biggest loser in the room anymore.
translation.zh: 可能吧 我其实只是不想再做家里最废物的人了

translation.en: Exactly.
You want respect. You wanna be the man.
translation.zh: 你想要尊重 你想做受人尊敬的男人

translation.en: Look at me. I'm basically a moron.
translation.zh: 看着我 我基本是个白痴

translation.en: I know people, and I know how this world works.
translation.zh: 我了解人性 知道这个世界怎样运转

translation.en: If you wanna be a man and not a little boy,
translation.zh: 如果你想成为受人尊敬的男人不再是小男孩

translation.en: you've gotta be willing to make bad choices now and then.
translation.zh: 就要偶尔做一些不好的选择

translation.en: What do you say?
Uh, hello, sir. Nice to meet you. Uh, I'm Bruce.
translation.zh: 你好 先生很高兴认识你 我叫布鲁斯

translation.en: Hi!
Bruce.
It is so nice to meet you.
I'm May.
That's Monk. He's from Hong Kong.
translation.zh: 那是和尚 他来自香港人

translation.en: And Jimmy. He just had a baby.
translation.zh: 这是吉米 他刚有了小孩

translation.en: And the guy who looks like an orange hipster is Bojing.
translation.zh: 看着像橙子的超人是博景

translation.en: Don't get him started on his fantasy football team.
translation.zh: 别让他开始讨论他的幻想橄榄球队

translation.en: And the guy with the scissors is Ernie. He's a wiz with Chinese paper cutting.
translation.zh: 还有拿着剪刀的人是厄尼他是中国剪纸界的高手

translation.en: -[chuckles] -Cool.
TK didn't mention how handsome you are.
Well, that'd be a… weird thing for TK to say. [laughs]
translation.zh: TK那样说的话 就太奇怪了

translation.en: Wouldn't it?
Oh! You're funny too!
Tell me about you, Bruce. What are your hobbies?
translation.zh: 给我讲讲你的事 布鲁斯你都有什么爱好？

translation.en: Oh, I don't know. Uh…
-Don't say improv. -I play some video games.
-Uh-huh. -Do some… improv.
[whispers] Oh fuck.
What about you?
-I have a loom in my house. -Like, for weaving?
Exactly! Like, I make a little extra money selling stuff on Etsy.
translation.zh: 没错！ 我在艺奇网卖手工艺品赚点零花钱

translation.en: -[Bruce] Cool. -And I also like to do this.
translation.zh: 好酷 我还喜欢做这个

translation.en: -My real passion is selling drugs. -Hmm.
Lots of them.
It's my baby.
Selling drugs is your baby?
Yes, Bruce.
And when I hire you to sell them for me, I'm handing you my baby.
translation.zh: 当我雇你给我卖的时候就是把我的宝贝交给你

translation.en: Do you understand how big a responsibility that is?
translation.zh: 你知道这是多么重大的责任吗？

translation.en: How upset I would be if you didn't care for my baby in the right way,
translation.zh: 如果你没有照顾好我的宝贝

translation.en: or, God forbid, hurt it?
translation.zh: 或者让它受伤了 我会多生气

translation.en: I think so.
Yes.
Definitely.
Hmm. You're a nice person.
-Thanks. -It wasn't meant as a compliment.
But I trust nice people.
They're honest, loyal,
too scared to fuck me over.
translation.zh: 胆小 不敢给我搞砸

translation.en: Mm-hmm.
Hooray!
I'm gonna go for a dance. Set him up.
translation.zh: 我去跳个舞 给他准备好

translation.en: And remember, have fun!
Bye.
See ya.
Cool jacket.
You did good.
Let's get to work.
-Hey! Here you are. -Oh, right, right. Uh…
Would you like to buy some drugs?
No, I'm not a cop. I-- I am not a cop!
Yo, how's it going?
Like trying to sell ice cream on a cold day.
translation.zh: 感觉像在冷天卖冰淇淋

translation.en: Product's good. Demand is obviously high. You just gotta have the right attitude.
translation.zh: 产品很多 需求显然很高你只需要摆正态度

translation.en: [Bruce] Like how?
Act more like a drug dealer and less like a fucking dork.
translation.zh: 表现得更像毒贩一样而不是像个呆瓜

translation.en: Improv!
Hey!
Come on! Let's dance.
I don't have time for this.
Oh! Uh… you want some snow?
You know, some-- some pearl?
Nose candy?
Uh, how about a disco biscuit?
Whoa, hey! Okay, I'm with May! See? I've got the pin!
translation.zh: 哇 喂！好吧 我跟梅是一伙的看到了吧？我有胸针

translation.en: Oh shit. Are-- are you a cop?
Oh God. Oh no, no, no.
Okay, okay. I-- I haven't sold anything.
translation.zh: 好 我什么都没卖出去

translation.en: I promise. Okay? I tried to, but I'm not any good at it.
translation.zh: 我保证 我想卖 但我不擅长

translation.en: -I-- I will testify against-- -Shut up!
What the hell are you doing here? Mom's gonna kill you.
translation.zh: 你在这里做什么？妈妈会杀了你的

translation.en: Mom?
I'm your brother. Charles.
We're getting out of here now.
-Wait, what? -Is there a problem here?
translation.zh: 等一下 什么？ -这里有什么问题吗？-有

translation.en: Yeah.
You're standing in my way.
He's working.
He quits.
-[groans] -[gasps] Oh my God.
[Bruce] Oh my God!
A taser?
[groans] My grandmother carries one in her purse.
Taser did just fine taking you out.
Who are you?
I'm, uh, Bruce.
Stop with the bullshit.
You think you can infiltrate my crew?
translation.zh: 你以为能混进我的人里？

translation.en: -Who are you working for? -For you!
I do some driving for Lyft,
but we're considered independent contractors--
translation.zh: 但我们被认为是独立合同工…

translation.en: He doesn't know shit.
Oh, and how do you know that?
-Because he's my brother. -[Bruce] That's not true.
I've never met this guy before.
translation.zh: 我以前从来没见过这个人

translation.en: We haven't seen each other in a long time. Since he left Taiwan.
translation.zh: 我们很久没见面了从他离开台湾就没见过了

translation.en: We shared a bedroom when we were little with a red carpet and a fake dog.
translation.zh: 我们小时候睡一个卧室里面有红地毯和一个假狗

translation.en: Mom wouldn't let us have a real one.
translation.zh: 妈妈不让我们养真的狗

translation.en: My name is Charles Sun.
[May] Bullshit. How do we know that's true?
translation.zh: 放屁 我们怎么知道是真的？

translation.en: Well, I could prove it by killing all of you.
translation.zh: 我可以杀了你们所有人来证明

translation.en: Or you could just check my ID.
translation.zh: 或者你可以看我的身份证

translation.en: Do you have any idea who this guy is?
translation.zh: 你们知道这个人是谁吗？

translation.en: Oh my God! He is a legend.
They call him Chairleg Sun.
His dad is the Red Pole of the Jade Dragons,
like, the biggest Triad in Taiwan.
Super brutal. Super ruthless.
translation.zh: 超级残忍 超级无情

translation.en: He groomed his son to be his own personal assassin.
translation.zh: 他把自己的儿子培养成自己的杀手

translation.en: Sometimes families are really fucked up.
translation.zh: 有时候家人真的很糟糕

translation.en: Is it true that you got your numbers
translation.zh: 你周六早上吃点心的时候

translation.en: after beating ten assassins to death at Saturday morning dim sum
translation.zh: 只用一个椅脚就把十个杀手打死之后就获得排位了

translation.en: with only a chair leg?
I killed three men with a rolling pin yesterday.
translation.zh: 我昨天用擀面杖杀了三个

translation.en: Like I said, a legend!
Wait, wait, wait, wait, wait. Hold--
Dad's rich?
And I'm here driving a Lyft?
We were trying to keep you safe.
translation.zh: 我们是想保护你们的安全

translation.en: Yeah, nice fucking work!
translation.zh: 是啊 不错的该死的工作！

translation.en: [May] Why are you here?
Are you trying to make a move in LA?
translation.zh: 你是想把业务扩展到洛杉矶吗？

translation.en: Because we're not interested in foreign interference.
translation.zh: 因为我们对外国干预没兴趣

translation.en: I don't like working for someone else.
I just need a couple of guys to help me for a few days.
translation.zh: 我只需要几个人 帮我几天

translation.en: -Hmm. With what? -None of your business.
translation.zh: 帮你什么？ 与你无关

translation.en: I pay well.
Maybe even enough to hire you.
Bitch, you definitely can't afford me.
translation.zh: 贱人 你肯定雇不起我

translation.en: Boys,
we're gonna soften up Chairleg a little.
If he fights back, shoot his brother in the balls.
translation.zh: 如果他还手 就开枪打他弟弟的蛋蛋

translation.en: What?
Oh! Oh shit! No!
Why are you stopping?
-I just gotta catch my breath. -We're in the middle of a beating.
translation.zh: -我要恢复一下呼吸-我们正打人呢

translation.en: They don't usually go on this long.
translation.zh: 通常别人不会坚持这么久

translation.en: I'm good to take a break if you guys need one.
translation.zh: 如果你们想休息 我也愿意休息一下

translation.en: Bruce, do me a favor.
Don't tell Mom.
What?
Any last words you wanna say to your brother?
translation.zh: 有什么最后的话想跟你弟弟说吗？

translation.en: [in Mandarin] Fuck!
The riddance of evil must be thorough.
-[man, in English] Where's Charles Sun? -[woman] Spread out! Find Charles Sun!
translation.zh: 查尔斯·孙在哪里？ 出去！找到查尔斯·孙！

translation.en: [man] Where's Charles Sun?
Hey.
Wake up.
We have to go. We have to go.
-[Charles groans] -[Bruce] Come on. Come on.
Let's go.
[grunts] Come on. Let's go.
-[tires squeal] -Bruce!
-Who is that? -[door slams]
My brother.
-[Bruce] Wait! -[groans] We can't come in looking like this. Mom is going to freak!
translation.zh: 等一下！我们不能这个样子进去妈妈会吓坏的！

translation.en: I found Bruce!
-He's safe. [groans] -What the hell?
Mom?
Charles, go get changed. We gotta get rid of the body.
translation.zh: 查尔斯 去换衣服我们要把尸体处理掉

translation.en: Bruce, go to bed. You got a test tomorrow.
translation.zh: 布鲁斯 去睡觉 你明天有考试
